articles.title: 'The Right Stuff' Presidents Day sales from Amazon, West Elm and more - Good Morning America
articles.description: Lori Bergamotto talks "Good Morning America" through Presidents Day weekend sales.
articles.content:
It's a big weekend for shopping!
Lori Bergamotto is rounding up all of the best Presidents Day weekend sales from retailers like Amazon, The Home Depot, Zappos and beyond, where there are deals on e… [+2948 chars]
